text: Ksenia, Fedor's Beloved Wife () is a 1974 Soviet comedy movie directed by Vitaliy Melnikov.Ушла из жизни актриса из фильма «А зори здесь тихие» Алла МещеряковаКСЕНИЯ, ЛЮБИМАЯ ЖЕНА ФЕДОРА It stars Alla Meshcheryakova, Stanislav Lyubshin, and Lev Durov. == Actors == * Alla Meshcheryakova as Kseniya Ivanova * Stanislav Lyubshin as Fyodor Petrov * Lev Durov as Sidorov * Lyudmila Zaytseva as Valentina * Vasiliy Merkurev as Personnel Director * Azat Sherents * Vladimir Tatosov as Kondratyev * Lorents Arushanyan as Reporter * Armen Khostikyan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1974 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Vitaliy Melnikov
title: Ksenia, Fedor's Beloved Wife
